articles.author: Will Foley
articles.title: IU’s lack of preparation, plan and adjustments exposed in 28-point loss to Louisville - Inside the Hall
articles.description: NASSAU, Bahamas – As Indiana basketball trailed by 30+ points in a thumping against Louisville to open the Battle 4 Atlantis Wednesday, head coach Mike Woodson stood still, arms on his hips, before taking a seat on the bench for the remainder of the game.
